children.text: This project aims to curate a comprehensive collection of films and interviews featuring one of Cubaâ€™s most influential filmmakers of the 21st century. Within this archive, you will have access to a series of interviews conducted over the years and a freely available selection of his filmography. The objective is to provide a resource that deepens the understanding of his contributions to cinema both as an innovative filmmaker and an individual.
Roadmap to best utilize this project, is to watch both of the available films, and then proceed to watch his most recent interview with Jack Riordan.

Lester Hamlet's first film is titled Tres Veces Dos, is a full feature film which features 3 short films by up and coming Cuban filmmakers of the early 2000's. Pavel Giroud, Lester Hamlet, and Esteban Insausti. All of these actors would go on to become award winning and globally recognized filmmakers nationally and internationally.
Casa Vieja is arguably one of Lester Hamlet's most acclaimed films, a modern-day adaptation of the play Casa Vieja by Abelardo Estorino in 1964.
After watching the films, the Jack Riordan Interview is the next step!
